name: Product Variations Swatches for WooCommerce
author: VillaTheme

sections.description:
Product Variations Swatches for WooCommerce is a professional plugin that allows you to show and select attributes for variation products. The plugin displays variation select options of the products under colors, buttons, images, variation images, radio so it helps the customers observe the products they need more visually, save time to find the wanted products than dropdown type for variations of a variable product.

Try the Demo |Documents |Pro Version | Facebook group

Important Notice:

  • Plugin works based on WooCommerce 5.x or higher, PHP 7.0+

  • It is released on WordPress.org and you can use plugin as free to build themes for sale.

FEATURES

► Converting any variations dropdown type into swatches with a couple of clicks:
When you activate WooCommerce Product Variations Swatches plugin, the variation products in the dropdown type will be converted into the variation swatches.

► Customizing the global attributes and custom attributes in the plugin setting:
This plugin allows you to customize quickly all existing global attributes in WooCommerce through the swatches setting of this plugin.

  • Search attribute: You can use the search bar to search for an existing global attribute

  • Display Style: You can set to display global attributes in 2 styles: Horizontal or vertical

  • Display Type: You can set to display global attributes in 5 types: Button, Color, Image, Variation Image, Radio

  • Swatches profile: You can select to show one of the available swatches profile

  • Edit terms of the global attributes: You can customize each attribute term of an existing global attribute

► Swatches profiles:
WooCommerce Product Variations Swatches plugin allows you to design and style for swatches profiles.

  • Customizing a swatches profile: You can customize to display a default swatch design pattern: Name, Padding, Height, Width, Font size, the size on mobile mode, on the product list, Color, Box-shadow effect

  • Styling Hover status: You can customize the hover status including Color, Background, Border, Box-shadow effect, Reduce size

  • Styling Selected status: You can customize the display status when a variation swatch is selected. The customization includes Color, Background, Border, Box-shadow effect, Reduce size

  • Customizing Tooltip: You can customize the tooltip status when a variation swatch is selected. including Color, Border, Font size and Positions of the tooltip

► Works on mobile: WooCommerce product variations swatches work perfectly on mobile devices

► Easy to use: Friendly interface and easy to use

PRO VERSION:

► All features from free version

► Unlimited Swatches profiles: You also can duplicate the current swatches profile to generate rapidly many swatch design patterns

► Show the particular attributes on product list: this allows you to show/hide a particular attribute on the product list

► Change product image: No matter type of swatches is, you can set image for each attribute term and make product image change accordingly when customer selects that attribute term

► Disable out-of-stock variation items: Out-of-stock attribute combination can be automatically detected and displayed as blur or crossed-out, clickable or not or even hidden

► Tooltip content: You can modify tooltip content and even use attribute/variation image in tooltip

► Installing easily to display custom attributes of the variation products on the front end:
You can easily install to display custom attributes of the variations products on the front end by the custom attribute option.

  • Custom attribute name: You can enter the name of the existing attributes, then customize them rapidly

  • Assign category: Choose in which categories customizing the attribute be applied

  • Display Style: You can select to display custom attributes in 2 styles: Horizontal or vertical

  • Display Type: You can select to display custom attributes in 5 types: Button, Color, Image, Variation Image, Radio

  • Swatches profile: Selecting to show custom attributes in one of the available swatches profile

  • Show on product list: This allows you to show/hide a particular custom attribute on the product list

► Display product variations swatches in the product list and assigned pages:
You can manage to show/hide the product variations swatches through some options in the display on the product list tab

  • Show Add to cart button: You can enable to show the Add to cart button and it will show up after selecting attributes

  • Show attribute name: You can select to show/hide the attribute name of variation swatches

  • Position: You can customize the positions of the variation swatch on the shop page, category page, and the products list

  • Text tooltip: This allows you to show or hide the variation text tooltip on the products list

  • Maximum attribute item: You can manage the number of the attribute items shown on the swatches

► Multilingual support:
If you use WPML to translate attributes, you only need configure attribute image in the primary language. Attribute image of translated attributes are inherited from original attribute.

sections.installation:
1. Unzip the download package
  2. Upload product-variations-swatches-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
